EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Auto Response - Nov16 Flow Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}: Thank you for registering for the Intapp Flow: Helping IT Do More with Less Webinar, happening on Wednesday, November 9th at 9am PST / 12pm EST / 5pm GMT. Please use the link below to add the event to your calendar, which contains the login information to access the webinar.
Add to Calendar:http://www.intapp.com/images/webinars/calendar-events/Intapp_Flow_Helping_IT_Do_More_with_Less.ics
